posts.post_content:
Hey fellas.

I am looking for a Walter Johnson portrait and a Cy Young glove shows.

I am not looking for a very high grade as that would likely be out of my budget on this particular deal. I simply want a decent looking piece, no matter the technical grade.

I do not care about rare backs in this particular instance. 

Feel free to PM me if you feel you have a potential match.

Thank you very much for your time.

Derek
I have one I am not home but I believe it is a PSA 1 very nice Cy  young glove for only $350
